amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the Economic High-Tech and Cyber Crime Prevention grant program by $2 million and to reduce funding for Science (Aeronautics) by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for State and Local Law Enforcement Assistance by $2 million and to reduce funding for Science (Aeronautics) by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kilmer amendment (A039) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Kilmer amendment (A039) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A039) offered by Mr. Kilmer.
